personal.name: Ibrahim Khan Riyadh
personal.title: Associate Software Engineer
personal.tagline: MERN-Stack Developer | Passionate about Crafting Seamless Web Experiences
personal.bio: I am a MERN stack and full-stack web developer skilled in React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, and modern databases like MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL. I love building responsive, user-focused applications with Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, and Firebase.
personal.closingBio: Always eager to collaborate on exciting projects, learn new technologies, and grow as a developer. Letâ€™s connect and build impactful digital experiences together!
story: I am a full-stack web developer with experience in building modern applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and Express. My expertise extends across both NoSQL (MongoDB, Firebase) and SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) databases, giving me flexibility in handling diverse project requirements.

I enjoy designing responsive and user-friendly interfaces with Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI, while also focusing on backend logic, secure APIs, and database management to ensure scalability and performance.

My projects include a Historical Artifacts Tracker, a Blood Donation Management System, and a Plant Care Tracker. These projects allowed me to implement features like authentication, role-based access control, and real-time data handling.

I am passionate about problem-solving, continuous learning, and writing clean, maintainable code. Beyond coding, I actively explore new frameworks and tools to stay up-to-date with modern web development trends.

experience.title: Team Lead & Deputy Project Coordinator
experience.description: Lead a team of developers and designers to successfully deliver multiple projects on time. Coordinated cross-functional teams to ensure smooth project execution and communication. Managed project timelines, resources, and client expectations effectively.
achievements: Lead multiple projects from planning to delivery ensuring timely completion
Coordinated cross-functional teams for smooth communication and workflow
Implemented best practices that improved team productivity and project quality
Gained strong skills in project management, team leadership, and problem-solving
Mentored team members and enhanced overall efficiency using collaborative tools

education.degree: Bachelor of Science (BSc), Computer Science and Engineering

projects.title: Bubble Bop
projects.subtitle: QR-Based Restaurant Management
projects.description: Hotel management system that takes orders for each table based on scanning QR codes available at tables, streamlining the dining experience.
projects.longDescription: Django-based restaurant management system featuring QR code table ordering, MongoDB integration, email notifications, and comprehensive order management. Includes both customer-facing ordering interface and restaurant management dashboard.

projects.title: Myxable
projects.subtitle: File Conversion Platform
projects.description: Open-source multiformat bulk file conversion platform that won 2nd place at Reva Hack 2021 hackathon.
projects.longDescription: Django-based file conversion platform supporting multiple file formats with bulk processing capabilities. Features user-friendly interface for seamless file format conversions, developed as part of hackathon competition.

projects.title: Valunique
projects.subtitle: Faceless Recruitment System
projects.description: Innovative recruitment platform eliminating bias through faceless hiring processes, developed during Volvo Group internship.
projects.longDescription: Node.js-based recruitment system designed to reduce hiring bias by focusing on skills and qualifications rather than personal attributes. Features comprehensive candidate evaluation, MySQL database integration, and EJS templating for dynamic content rendering.

seo.title: Ibrahim Khan Riyadh - Full-Stack Developer (React/Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB)
seo.description: Full-Stack Developer with expertise in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, Axios, and Stripe. Experienced in building responsive, scalable web applications and implementing efficient frontend-backend workflows.
